description: This file implements logging functions primarily for remote logging in a software system. It manages log message formatting, sending logs over a communication interface, and matching log severity levels. The code includes functions for initializing logger structures and preventing recursive logging.

methods.name: void logger_remote_log(logger_t * self,logger_msg_t * msg)
methods.description: Formats a log message with thread ID, timestamp, module name, tag, and text, then sends it via a remote connection, preventing recursion and checking if remote logging is enabled.

methods.name: bool logger_remote_match(log_severity_t sev,log_module_t module)
methods.description: Checks if a log message's severity level is less than or equal to the configured severity for a specific log module.

methods.name: bool logger_remote_new(logger_t * self)
methods.description: Initializes a logger object with function pointers for remote logging and matching severity levels.
